public class GameController
extends SimpleController

The main controller of the game, handles main initiation and update of time

createNewGame

public void createNewGame(WeaponDefinition[] weaponData,
                          SpecialAbilityDefinition special,
                          PassiveAbilityDefinition passive)
Creates or recreates a game "state". This method should be called before switching to the GameScreen.

gameOver

public void gameOver()
The player has died, the game is over

pause

public void pause()
Pauses the game when the application loses focus. If game isn't over, show pause gui. If it is over, only keep track of pause state.

Specified by:
pause in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Overrides:
pause in class SimpleController

pauseGame

public void pauseGame()
Pauses the game

resume

public void resume()
Do nothing when application resumes, let the user resume the game. Unless the current game is over, in which case keep track of the pause state of the app.

Specified by:
resume in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Overrides:
resume in class SimpleController
